summary:
- **Announcement Type:** Employee Incentive Plan Share Issuance  
- **Securities Issued:** 26,082 ordinary fully paid shares (BMT)  
  - 8,650 shares at $0.1892 (20% discount to 5-day VWAP as of 30 April 2025)  
  - 10,195 shares at $0.1605 (20% discount to 5-day VWAP as of 31 May 2025)  
  - 7,237 shares at $0.2261 (20% discount to 5-day VWAP as of 30 June 2025)  
- **Total Issued Shares Post-Issuance:** 290,558,060 ordinary shares  
- **Unquoted Securities:** 16,983,337 performance rights (BMTAC)  
- **Purpose:** Shares issued under shareholder-approved Employee Incentive Plan.  

*No material liquidity, valuation, or capital structure impact (minor dilution).*
